软件包 com.jdon.annotation.model
的使用

使用 com.jdon.annotation.model 的软件包
com.jdon.async   
com.jdon.sample.test.dci   
com.jdon.sample.test.domain.onecase   
com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase   
com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase.dci   
com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase.repository   
 

com.jdon.async 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
Send
          Domain Model should normal live in memory not in database. so cache in memory is very important for domain model life cycle.
 

com.jdon.sample.test.dci 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
Send
          Domain Model should normal live in memory not in database. so cache in memory is very important for domain model life cycle.
 

com.jdon.sample.test.domain.onecase 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
Send
          Domain Model should normal live in memory not in database. so cache in memory is very important for domain model life cycle.
 

com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
Send
          Domain Model should normal live in memory not in database. so cache in memory is very important for domain model life cycle.
 

com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase.dci 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
Send
          Domain Model should normal live in memory not in database. so cache in memory is very important for domain model life cycle.
 

com.jdon.sample.test.domain.simplecase.repository 使用的 com.jdon.annotation.model 中的类
OnEvent
          Marks a method as a handler for a domain event sent by @Send; it can be used together with in those classes with @Component or @Service;
